Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.assets

Class AnimatedTexture

java.lang.Object
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.assets.AnimatedTexture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Asset
public class AnimatedTexture extends Object implements Asset
An animated texture that can be created from an array of Textures with a fixed frame duration. Once applied on a Shape or a Sprite, it is automatically updated using the current scene's clock as the time reference.

  • Field Details

    • animatedObjects

      public static final Map<Drawable,AnimatedTexture> animatedObjects
      Stores bindings between Drawable objects and AnimatedTextures. Since native JSFML classes are not modified, this is the only way to assign an AnimatedTexture to an object. This map does not need to be accessed and should not be modified from outside of the Kyanite framework.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimatedTexture

      public AnimatedTexture(@NotNull @NotNull Texture[] frames, float frameDuration)
      Creates an animated texture from the specified frames. Every frame will last frameDuration seconds.
      Parameters:
      frames - the frames of this animated texture
      frameDuration - duration of a single frame (in seconds)

    • AnimatedTexture

      public AnimatedTexture(@NotNull @NotNull Texture[][] frames, float frameDuration)
      Creates an animated texture from the specified frames. Every frame will last frameDuration seconds. The 2D array will be flattened into a 1D array.
      Parameters:
      frames - the frames of this animated texture
      frameDuration - duration of a single frame (in seconds)

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public void apply(@NotNull @NotNull Shape shape)
      Applies this texture on the Shape.
      Parameters:
      shape - the Shape to apply this texture on

    • apply

      public void apply(@NotNull @NotNull Sprite sprite)
      Applies this texture on the Sprite.
      Parameters:
      sprite - the Sprite to apply this texture on

    • remove

      public void remove(@NotNull @NotNull Shape shape)
      Removes this texture from the Shape.
      Parameters:
      shape - the Shape to remove this texture from

    • remove

      public void remove(@NotNull @NotNull Sprite sprite)
      Removes this texture from the Sprite.
      Parameters:
      sprite - the Sprite to remove this texture from

    • update

      public void update(@NotNull @NotNull Object object, @NotNull @NotNull Time elapsedTime)
      Updates this texture for the specified object. This method is run by the scene loop and does not need to be invoked manualy.
